TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
Oh yeah! We added the content of sleeping pills there. Sleep tight!

Waiter! There's no soup! You served me an empty bowl!

Baby, wake up! A new page has come!

It's not a bowl, country boy, it's a dish cup. Your food is hiding under it.

Waiter! Do you have normal knives instead of this rounded junk? How, do you think, should I stick it into the table?

Yes, we have knives. How do you stick it? Stab the table like how you... just make up a simulation involving knives.

Waiter! You served me paella! Do you think this is soup?!

It's not paella, it's paello. It woke up our cook by cockadoodledooing, and that was his last mistake.

Waiter! Is this pork Borg?

Waiter: No. only the forums get borked.

Customer: Do you have soup in a cup?

Edited January 23, 2022 by ColdJ

For champions only. It's a champion cup.

Waiter! Fried champignons, please.

Waiter: This is the soup room sir, you need to go nextdoor to the Mush room.

Customer: Some mintchip icecream in a soup bowl please.

Sure, here's an extra EXTRA mintchip ice cream. In fact, the soup is now an ice cream bowl!

Waiter! I'm allergic to mushroom and you put a ton of it!

Don't worry, sir. They are allergic to you even more.

Waiter! Ot's the third dish of oysters already, and where is at least one pearl in them? Do you steal them together with cook?

W: C, oysters don't wear pearl necklaces.

c: Ja, das suppe sind sehr gut!

Edited January 24, 2022 by Akagi

Yes, it's a gut soup. Mostly cow gut, but a little of pig ones, too.

Waiter! Are you trolling? How can I smell this wine, wearing the mask?

Edited January 24, 2022 by kerbiloid

W: Yes.

C: W, what is a potatostewomatic?

Waiter: Our potato peeler. His name is Stewart.

Customer. Where can I find some croutons for my soup?

Start collecting croukilograms.

Waiter! What's this fork sequential number?

David. 

 

 

C: W, what's life?

A game about reproduction of pieces.

Waiter! Water!

Here you go, sir, spicy water.

Waiter! There's barely any spices here!

Waiter: They were all used up for the spice of life.

Customer. I'd like an hamburger island with a chips palm tree in my soup please.

Don't worry, I'll bring a cloth to clean.

Waiter! A cherry jelly fish, please.

Waiter: Here you go, a cherry, a jelly and a fish.

Customer: Why is the fish swimming in my bowl?

It's bowling.

Waiter! One Coffee-Cola, please

Waiter: Here you are sir, one boiling hot soda.

Customer: Ice water for me thanks.

Here you go, ice cubes filled with mountain water. Eat it yourself.

Waiter! A kerbal is splashing on the soup!

Chef: Why is that waiter in your soup?

Customer:Because they were snappish with me before so I thought I'd have fish soup.

The wish was fighting and has protected her soup, Choose anything instead, please.

Waiter! Why should I smell every bottle of vine? Do they turn sour in your shed, or what? Why do I never have to smell Pepsi or Sprite?
